text: Núria Feliu i Mestres (21 September 1941 – 22 July 2022) was a Spanish Catalan singer and actress. She was a popular person during the Nova Cançó movement. She was born in Barcelona. She was also a Catalonia independence activist, having supported the 2017 Catalan independence referendum.Mor Núria Feliu, icona de la cançó catalana, als 80 anys Feliu died on 22 July 2022 in Barcelona from problems caused by a stroke, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish singers Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Actors from Barcelona Category:Spanish activists
title: Núria Feliu
